product_name: prAna Malina Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Layered over the familiar support of your own bra, the eye-catching prAna Malina tank top brings quick-drying performance and a touch of style to your yoga practice. Quick-drying partially-recycled polyester and spandex is a great choice for light exercise and offers 4-way stretch; sublimation print on front and back. Closeout.
short_description: Layered over the familiar support of your own bra, the eye-catching prAna Malina tank top brings quick-drying performance and a touch of style to your yoga practice.
